name: iSibeeta HD
description:
================================
FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME.

NOW WITH ONLINE MULTIPLAYER!
================================

From the makers of the smash-hit and critically acclaimed card game iKout, comes another fantastic card game to enjoy by yourself or with a group of four, five, and even six friends: iSibeeta.

iSibeeta is a popular Kuwaiti trick-taking card game based on Hearts. In iSibeeta you must be crafty in avoiding ‘penalty cards’ while trying to feed them to your opponents.

Players will be pleased with the stunning animations, catchy music and sounds, and a delightfully immersive gameplay experience.

Further awesome features include:

➤ An engaging single player mode with devious AI opponents.
➤ A local multiplayer mode to challenge friends or family (Wi-Fi/Bluetooth).
➤ An online multiplayer mode via Game Center.
➤ An intuitive easy-to-use tutorial to quickly get started.
➤ 7 unique characters to choose from.
➤ A slick and informative statistics section to keep track of your progress and achievements.
➤ GAME CENTER: Many challenging achievements to unlock.
➤ GAME CENTER: Leaderboards to see where you rank worldwide.
➤ Share your statistics at the end of the game via Facebook, Twitter, or send a screenshot to brag to your friends.
➤ Available in Arabic and English.
